briefdescription.para: System call to construct a LBManager.
Get the name of the component.
Decide which LB to invoke given a certain phase.

parameterdescription.para: whether to try to read from file

briefdescription.para: Collectively wait for LB, used to invoke without consideration of readiness of the state of live collections.
Get the proxy for the LBManager.
Setup the proxy for the LBManager.
Tell the manager the LB is finished.

simplesect.para: This should not be called by the user, only by load balancers. Not private/protected as friending every LBs adds too much overhead

briefdescription.para: Print the memory usage for a phase.
Communicate to the trace component that a new phase occurred, so tracing can be enabled or disabled.
Communicate to the trace component that a new phase occurred so flushing of traces can occur if required.
Tell the manager that a collection has hit nextPhase so load balancing can begin once all collections enter.
Tell the manager that a collection has hit nextPhase, choosing to skip load balancing.
Register a listener to trigger after LB completes.
Unregister a listener to trigger after LB completes.
Trigger all after-LB listeners.

memberdef.argsstring: (PhaseType phase, LBType lb, bool manual, std::size_t num_calls=1)
memberdef.name: collectiveImpl

briefdescription.para: Collectively start load balancing.

parameterdescription.para: whether it's manual or invoked from a collection
number of calls required to start

briefdescription.para: Release control back to user.

parameterdescription.para: number of calls required to start

briefdescription.para: Release control back to user now (without counting down)
Collectively construct a new load balancer.

simplesect.para: objgroup proxy to the new load balancer

briefdescription.para: A VT component that manages creation and coordination of load balancers.

detaileddescription.para: Manages starting and stopping load balancers depending on user's selection and invocation.
